verse.name: c1
verse.lines: His power can make you newline What you ought to be. newline His blood can cleanse your heart newline And make you free. newline His love can fill your soul newline And you will see newline 'Twas best for Him to have newline His way with thee.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Would you live for Jesus, newline And be always pure and good? newline Would you walk with Him newline Within the narrow road? newline Would you have Him bear your burden, newline Carry all your load? newline Let Him have His way with thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Would you have Him make you free, newline And follow at His call? newline Would you know the peace newline That comes by giving all? newline Would you have Him save you, newline So that you need never fall? newline Let Him have His way with thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Would you in His kingdom newline Find a place of constant rest? newline Would you prove Him true newline In providential test? newline Would you in His service labor newline Always at your best? newline Let Him have His way with thee.
